name: Castle XXXIII
description:
Castle XXXIII is a small game made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3 heavily inspired by Wolfenstein 3D and old 3D games like Castle Master and Total Eclipse.

You need to escape from the Castle XXXIII's dungeon.

Avoid the prisoner's ghost and find the three levers to open the gates.

Controls:

NumPad 4 / Q
Turn LeftNumPad 5 / W
Move Forward NumPad 6 / E
Turn RightNumPad 1 / A
Move LeftNumPad 2 / S
Move BackwardNumPad 3 / D
Move Right

Credits:

Furniture and door model from https://www.kenney.nl/
